vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἄννα, -ας, ἡ (Heb. חָנָה),
Anna, a prophetess: Luk.2:36.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Luk.2.36;
daughter of: Phanuel (G5323)
§ Anna, "grace"
Anna, (Proper name), Lk. 2:26*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞拿 这个陰性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "恩典"
耶路撒冷的女先知,屬亞設支派. 在聖殿見到嬰孩耶穌 (路 2:36)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚拿 这个阴性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "恩典"
耶路撒冷的女先知,属亚设支派. 在圣殿见到婴孩耶稣 (路 2:36)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: An-ne « ân điển », một nữ tiên tri. H2584
